Articles.Content:
<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Nc94UQOmkdc?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

hooray!!! ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
I didn't even clock until I saw the word Halcyon. Great to have him back!
People in the comments think it's a conspiracy.
I commented on the video because the words I wanted to use would get me banned here. So awesome
Macey Dean is back. Watching it now...

I can't believe it....

Edit: Going to have go watch the last EP to remeber what happened.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-06T02:11:54Z" title="05/06/2015 02:11  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 6, 2015</time> by briansun1**

> 
> I commented on the video because the words I wanted to use would get me banned here. So awesome

I still dislike that rule.

On topic however, video was amazing.

I *will* watch this man's channel from here on out! Give Macey a Nobel Peace Prize! The KSP community can finally rejubilate! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

He... is back? *What.*

I am so happy.

> 
> I still dislike that rule.....

Meh, each to their own.

Thouugh am I the only one disappointed not to hear his legendary voice?
I knew what this thread was about before I opened it, but only because I was pleasantly shocked to see Macy Dean pop up on my yt feed again...and that is just wonderful.
What? Awesome!!! I thought he'd never come back!

> 
> What? Awesome!!! I thought he'd never come back!

Your lack of faith is disturbing?
Holy cows!
Huzzah!

Yay, so glad to see he's back! However, what does this mean for his Oscar-B Award nomination for best inactive channel? D:

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115987-The-Oscar-B-Awards!-%28Now-with-a-Time-Extension-Maybe!%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/115987-The-Oscar-B-Awards!-%28Now-with-a-Time-Extension-Maybe!%29)

> 
> Meh, each to their own.
> Thouugh am I the only one disappointed not to hear his legendary voice?

This is one of the thing fueling those conspiracy theories that it is not him.

I was so happy to see his video ... though it seemed a little different to what I was used to from him. Possibly my mind has just built him up to some legendary level though. Or possibly he's just 2 years older, and a changed person.
Awesome ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

For a long, long time (over a year), we have heard almost nothing of what happened to Macey Dean. However, as of the 5^th^ of May, 2015, a whole new video has been uploaded on his channel. I think his comment says it all.

"***Thank you so much for still being here, and I'm very sorry to have been silent for so long. I have left a brief explanation as to why I've been absent over on my channel discussion. I am back, and I intend to stay back.***

***I will be returning to the usual narrative episodes, as Spiritwolf attempt to retake Laythe, but first we needed to tell Shelbus's story and cover events following the battle.***"

Edit: link to the video

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Nc94UQOmkdc?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-06T11:55:48Z" title="05/06/2015 11:55  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 6, 2015</time> by Marlowe345**
  
Adding a link to the video
Yeah, it kinda made my morning today ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I'm just glad it was life that happened and not the opposite. It's great to have him back.
It must be strange for him. It's like going to sleep in the .21st century and waking up in the 1.00th Century XD. It's great that he's alive and not 6 feet under as the rumours made me think
Perfect way to start my day! It's been two years, I can't express how excited I am!
It's a cinematic continuation of the Shelbus story, very similar to episode 11 "Far From Home" also a cinematic minimovie about Shelbus. He's using camera mods for better production value.

**Yes** **!**

He is back.

I am now full.
